recipe.title: Green Summer Soup
ingredients: 3 cups green peas (frozen and defrosted, or fresh—not canned)
instructions: Combine peas, stock and mint in a blender or food processor. You can adjust the proportion of peas to stock depending on your taste for viscosity. Heat in a pot. Season with salt and pepper. Serve in bowls. (This is important; soup should not be served on a plate!) Makes 4 cups
